action_title: Add woody debris to protect seeds/plants
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study examined the effects of adding woody debris to protect seeds/plants on grassland vegetation. The study was in Kenya.

VEGETATION COMMUNITY (0 STUDIES)
VEGETATION ABUNDANCE (0 STUDIES)
VEGETATION STRUCTURE (0 STUDIES)
OTHER (1 STUDY)

Survival (1 study): One replicated, randomized, controlled study in KenyaÂ found that sowing buffel grass seeds beside woody debris did not affect seedling survival.
